name: Don't Freeze (Tomento)
description:
You are a viking who is trying to bring treasure to the altar, but what happens when you freeze? Is it failure or progress?

  • Made with Unity during Wowie Jam 3.0
  • Topic: FAILURE IS PROGRESS

Controls:
WASD - move
Shift - sprint
Space - taking/grabbing objects
Enter - Settings

Author:
BugC - GameDev

Used assets:
  • Graphics
    • Frozen GUI Pack
    • POLYGON - Vikings Pack
    • POLYGON - Adventure Pack
    • PolyWorks: Full Pack
    • FREE Skybox Extended Shader
    • Quick Outline
    • Frost Effect
  • Music
    • Wild West Vikings
  • Scripts
    • Unity Standard Assets
